data.title: Opportunities with Parker Meggitt
data.meta_description: Parker MeggittParker Meggitt is a business segment of Parker Areospace. We are a global leader in the research, design, integration, manufacture, certification,
data.text:
Parker Meggitt is a business segment of Parker Aerospace.

At Parker Aerospace, we develop technologies and innovative solutions that enable reliable, efficient and increasingly sustainable flight, for the lifecycle of the aircraft, including aftermarket support. Our passionate people, together with our breadth of differentiated technologies, ensure that we make the extraordinary happen and continue to shape the future of aviation in partnership with our customers.

Joining our team means you're helping to deliver our purpose of 'Enabling Engineering Breakthroughs that Lead to a Better Tomorrow'. A career at Parker Meggitt offers boundless potential for professional and personal growth. You will work alongside the brightest minds in the world, help develop innovative technology and products, and contribute to our company's goal of solving the world's greatest engineering challenges.

We have succeeded in employing the top talent in the industry by focusing our hiring efforts on the individual, not the job description. If you are an inquisitive thinker with great ideas and a desire to succeed, we will find the perfect spot for you on our team.

Our Apprenticeships offer a range of opportunities for individuals to learn while they earn, whether they are school leavers or career changers.

These range from hands-on manufacturing roles through to a variety of office-based roles and are all designed to equip individuals with transferrable and specialist skills to enhance their career options.

All of our Apprenticeship programmes offer high quality training via carefully selected training providers, along with on-the-job training to prepare individuals for a successful future within the company.

WHAT WILL YOU GET FROM US?

Earn while you learn - You’ll earn a competitive salary for the full length of the programme, and you’ll receive holiday leave and other benefits.

On-the-job training - You’ll gain on-hands experience of doing the job, learning all aspects of the role.

Gain qualifications - You’ll earn the qualifications you need as part of your apprenticeship, with the opportunity to achieve more qualifications through higher education or higher learning.

Gain experience - You’ll not only gain the skills you need for the job, you’ll also go through our High Performance Culture training and other soft skills training.

Networking and events - You’ll be part of the wider Parker Meggitt team and will have the opportunity to attend events and join our Employee Resource Groups.

Apprenticeship leadership - You’ll have a dedicated team who will look after you and support you along the way.

Support and advice - You’ll be provided guidance and advice from our Parker Meggitt team, SMEs and other business leaders.

WHAT WILL WE EXPECT FROM YOU?

About you - You’ll need to be 16 years or older and not in full-time education already, to join one of our apprenticeship programmes.

Commitment and dedication - We’re looking for individuals who are willing to put in hard-work, time and effort into learning as much as possible.

Bring yourself - You’ll be encouraged to be you; you’ll be appreciated for your individuality and supported to be the very best that you can be.

Build relationships - You’ll build lasting positive relationships based on doing the right thing in the right way, listening, being open, inclusive, and supportive.

Share our purpose - You’ll enjoy being part of our highly skilled team who share a sense of purpose and are passionate about what we do and how we do it.
